attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Arclight attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Confuse a character you control. • Arclight gets +2 ATK for this attack.
name: Arclight

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Chimera attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Spend a [mental] resource. • Chimera gets +2 ATK for this attack.
name: Chimera

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Greycrow attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Discard the highest-cost card you control. • Greycrow gets +X ATK for this attack, where X is the printed cost of the highest-cost card you control.
name: Greycrow

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Riptide attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Place 2 threat on the main scheme and 1 threat on each side scheme. • Riptide gets +2 ATK for this attack.
name: Riptide

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When Riptide attacks you or an ally you control, choose: • Place 3 threat on the main scheme and 1 threat on each side scheme. • Riptide gets +2 ATK for this attack and this attack gains ranged and piercing.
name: Riptide
Mutant Massacre
text: Action: Exhaust a [[MORLOCK]] ally → shuffle Hide! from the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck. If there are 3 villains under Routed, the players win the game. If this stage is completed or there are no Morlock allies in play, the players lose the game.

name: Morlock
text: Victory -1. Does not count against your ally limit. Card abilities cannot remove this ally from play. Forced Interrupt: When an enemy attacks you, it attacks a Morlock you control instead.

boost_text: Give 1 [[MORLOCK]] ally a tough status card. Give the villain 1 additional boost card for this activation.
name: Hide!
text: Surge. When Revealed: Give 1 [[MORLOCK]] ally a tough status card.

name: Routed
text: Standard Mode Only. Cards under here are not in play. Forced Response: After the villain is defeated, put it under here. Discard each minion that shares a title with the top villain of the villain deck. (That villain is in play.) The villain activates against each player in player order.

boost_text: This card gets +X boost icons ([boost]), where X is the number of villains under Routed.
name: Bolstered by Wrath
text: Attach to the villain. Hero Action: Exhaust a character you control and spend X resources of any type, where X is the number of villains under Routed → discard this card.

name: Pushed to the Limit
text: Attach to the villain. While there is exactly 1 villain under Routed, attached villain gains steady. While there are exactly 2 villains under Routed, attached villain gains stalwart. Hero Action: Attached villain attacks you → discard this card.

name: Escaping with Hope
text: Each [[MARAUDER]] minion gains guard and steady. In expert mode, the villain gains steady. If the villain is defeated, the players win the game. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

attack_text: Forced Interrupt: When the villain would attack you, if a [[MARAUDER]] minion is engaged with you, the villain schemes instead.
name: Hope's Captor
text: Permanent. The villain gets +6[per_hero] hit points. When Revealed: Advance the main scheme to stage 2A. This effect cannot be canceled.

attack_text: Juggernaut gets +1 ATK for each momentum counter here.
name: Juggernaut
text: When Revealed: Place 1 momentum counter here. Give Juggernaut a tough status card.

name: The Unstoppable Juggernaut
text: Forced Interrupt: When this scheme would be completed, instead do each of the following: 1. Remove all threat from here. 2. If Juggernaut Exposed is in play, flip it. 3. Place 1 momentum counter on Juggernaut. 4. Juggernaut attacks each player in player order (even if they are in alter-ego form).

name: Juggernaut's Helmet
text: Permanent. Attach to Juggernaut. Juggernaut gains stalwart and his attacks gain overkill. Hero Action: Spend 3 resources of the same type → remove each momentum counter from Juggernaut. Flip this card.

name: Juggernaut Exposed
scheme_text: Forced Response: After Juggernaut schemes, place 1 momentum counter on Juggernaut. Flip this card.
text:
Permanent. Attach to Juggernaut.
Juggernaut takes 1 additional damage from each card with a printed [mental] resource.

flavor: "Visionary, savior, madman. It doesn't matter. I am SINISTER."
name: Mister Sinister
text: Forced Response: After a status card is placed on Mister Sinister, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: Genetic Mastery
text: When Revealed: If Mister Sinister has the following traits: • [[AERIAL]] - Take 2 indirect damage. • [[BRUTE]] - Exhaust your identity. • [[PSIONIC]] - Place 2 threat on the main scheme.

name: Flight
text:
Setup. Attach to the villain.
Permanent.
Attached villain gains the [[AERIAL]] trait.

name: Super Strength
text: Setup. Attach to the villain. Permanent. Attached villain gains the [[BRUTE]] trait and steady. (Steady characters require 2 status cards of the same type to be stunned or confused.)

name: "I'll Take That"
text: When Revealed: Discard the upgrade you control with the lowest cost (highest cost instead if the villain has the [[PSIONIC]] trait). If no upgrade was discarded this way, this card gains surge.

name: Telepathy
text: Setup. Attach to the villain. Permanent. Attached villain gains the [[PSIONIC]] trait and retaliate 1. (After this character is attacked, deal 1 damage to the attacking character.)

attack_text: While Stryfe is attacking you, he gets +X ATK, where X is the number of cards of the most common type in your hand.
name: Stryfe

flavor: Hope tries to mimic Stryfe's abilities, but is quickly overwhelmed by the power.
name: Uncontrollable Power
text: Forced Response: After resolving step one of the villain phase, each player places X threat here, where X is the number of cards of the most common type in their hand. Each player may discard 1 card from their hand before calculating the value of X. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

flavor: Stryfe is attempting to escape into the past. Who knows what havoc he will wreak?
name: Left to Your Fate
text: Stryfe gains stalwart. Each identity gets +2 hand size. Increase the resource cost to play each player card by 1. If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.

name: Stryfe's Grasp
text: Permanent. Hinder 6[per_hero]. Hope Summers can attack only Stryfe and can thwart only this scheme. Forced Response: After Stryfe is defeated or the last threat is removed from this scheme, flip this card and reveal Living Bomb. Place any threat here on Living Bomb.

flavor: Mimicking Stryfe's power is too much for Hope to control and threatens to overwhelm her...with explosive results!
name: Living Bomb
text: Victory 1. Stryfe cannot be defeated. When Revealed: Advance the main scheme to stage 2A. This effect cannot be canceled.

attack_text: Forced Response: After Tempo activates against you, discard cards from the top of your deck equal to twice the number of cards in your hand.
name: Tempo
scheme_text: Forced Response: After Tempo activates against you, discard cards from the top of your deck equal to twice the number of cards in your hand.
text: While Tempo is engaged with you, you get +1 hand size.
